name: Hoop Race!
description:
Welcome to Hoop Race!

How hard can it be rolling your plates ball?

Well, watch your shots because this is going to be hard!
Just swipe around and take the ball and make your best dunk of your life!
Don't be so rush, or your enemy may outrage your score!

If you think you can make your best shots, then download Hoop Race right now!
